de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexsub

Class BingSMTWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasureBase
      • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasureBase
        • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.JCasTextSimilarityMeasureBase
          • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexsub.BingSMTWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.JCasTextSimilarityMeasure, de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.SimilarityMeasure, de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasure, de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasure

    public class BingSMTWrapper
extends de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.JCasTextSimilarityMeasureBase
    Similarity measure which uses the Microsoft Bing translator to translate the original texts into a given bridge language and back to the original language. The idea is that in the translation process, lexical gaps are closed.
